title: Hello!
body: Hello, this is my portfolio! I plan to improve it by adding a contact form and strengthening the backend code. Check this blog to see progress updates on my main project, the interactive D&D character generator and character sheet. Also look for updates on the SVG animation projects I'm working on.
author: Shantia Grimes
